Package com.paiondata.aristotle.controller

Class NodeController

java.lang.Object
com.paiondata.aristotle.controller.NodeController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/node") @Validated public class NodeController extends Object
Controller for handling graph node-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • getNodeByUuid

      @GetMapping("/{uuid}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Result<NodeVO>> getNodeByUuid(@PathVariable @NotBlank(message="uuid must not be blank!") @NotBlank(message="uuid must not be blank!") String uuid)
      Retrieves a node by its UUID.

      This method handles a GET request to retrieve a node based on the provided UUID. It validates the UUID and calls the node service to fetch the node data. If the node is found, it is wrapped in a Result object and returned. If the node is not found, a failure result with an appropriate message is returned.

      Parameters:
      uuid - the UUID of the node to retrieve
      Returns:
      a Result object containing the node data as a NodeVO, or a failure message if the node is not found

    • kDegreeExpansion

      @GetMapping("/expand") public Result<GraphVO> kDegreeExpansion(@RequestParam @NotBlank(message="uuid must not be blank!") @NotBlank(message="uuid must not be blank!") String graphUuid, @RequestParam @NotBlank(message="uuid must not be blank!") @NotBlank(message="uuid must not be blank!") String nodeUuid, @RequestParam @NotNull(message="degree must not be null!") @NotNull(message="degree must not be null!") Integer degree)
      Retrieves a k-degree expansion of a node.

      This endpoint retrieves the k-degree expansion of a node within a specified graph. If the input degree is less than 0, the maximum depth is directly returned.

      Parameters:
      graphUuid - The UUID of the graph.
      nodeUuid - The UUID of the node.
      degree - The degree that needs to be expanded.
      Returns:
      A Result object containing the expanded graph represented as a GraphVO.

    • createAndBindNode

      @PostMapping public Result<List<NodeVO>> createAndBindNode(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid NodeCreateDTO graphNodeCreateDTO)
      Creates and binds nodes.

      This method handles a POST request to create and optionally bind nodes. It validates the input DTO and calls the node service to create the nodes. If specified, it also binds the nodes with relationships. The result is wrapped in a Result object with a success message and the list of created nodes.

      Parameters:
      graphNodeCreateDTO - the NodeCreateDTO containing the node creation and binding information
      Returns:
      a Result object containing a success message and a list of created nodes as NodeVO

    • updateNode

      @PostMapping("/update") public Result<String> updateNode(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid NodeUpdateDTO nodeUpdateDTO)
      Updates a node.

      This method handles a POST request to update a node based on the provided update DTO. It validates the input DTO and calls the node service to perform the update. The result is wrapped in a Result object with a success message.

      Parameters:
      nodeUpdateDTO - the NodeUpdateDTO containing the updated node information
      Returns:
      a Result object containing a success message

    • updateNodeRelation

      @PutMapping("/relate") public Result<String> updateNodeRelation(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid RelationUpdateDTO relationUpdateDTO)
      Updates a relation between nodes.

      This method handles a PUT request to update a relation between nodes based on the provided update DTO. It validates the input DTO and calls the node service to perform the relation update. The result is wrapped in a Result object with a success message.

      Parameters:
      relationUpdateDTO - the RelationUpdateDTO containing the updated relation information
      Returns:
      a Result object containing a success message

    • deleteNode

      @DeleteMapping public Result<String> deleteNode(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid NodeDeleteDTO nodeDeleteDTO)
      Deletes nodes by their UUIDs.

      This method handles a DELETE request to delete nodes based on the provided UUIDs. It validates the input DTO and calls the node service to perform the deletion. The result is wrapped in a Result object with a success message.

      Parameters:
      nodeDeleteDTO - the NodeDeleteDTO containing the UUIDs of the nodes to delete
      Returns:
      a Result object containing a success message
